response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but this offer represents a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a premium. Should you choose to accept, we assure you a seamless transaction with all necessary support and documentation provided. If you need time to consider, please let us know. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 950000}
